content: We can hold on to the childhood rewards for cleaning your room mowing the grass and that snow you hated to shovel and you must have learned as you departed the nest all those hideous chores that must be stared down come without motivation you are working without reward wow work void of compensation , I can see the hesitation as I’m heading out the door , a smerk with the understanding I’m getting paid for the job I do well it’s responsibility really now did you forget that you will have the satisfaction of a job well done. Now dont you feel better!!
